thumb.name: All About Love Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EChuck%3Cbr%3Eand%3Cbr%3ECindy%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe%26#146;re what love is all about.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine%26#146;s Day.%3Cbr%3EChuck%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith All My Love.%3Cbr%3ECindy%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Prepare to Be Hugged
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Valentine's Day. Debbie!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EPrepare to be hugged.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: From the Heart
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You. %3Cbr%3EThomas%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Valentine's Day%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis Valentine's Day wish%3Cbr%3Ecomes from the heart%3Cbr%3Eof someone%3Cbr%3Ewho thinks about you %3Cbr%3Emore often than you know.%3Cbr%3Eand wishes you%3Cbr%3Eevery little happiness%3Cbr%3Etoday and every day.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope Your Day Is Very Happy

thumb.name: It's Spring!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Spring!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ETake a break.%3Cbr%3E Take a look.%3Cbr%3E Take a hint.%3Cbr%3E Take a bite out of life.%3Cbr%3E Take it or leave it.%3Cbr%3E Take it easy.%3Cbr%3E Take it to the limit.%3Cbr%3E Take time off%26#133;%3Cbr%3ETake all the happiness%3Cbr%3Eyou can find!%3Cbr%3EHave a Great Season

thumb.name: Lucky to Have You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn this world.%3Cbr%3Eyou only get one Mother...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and if you're%3Cbr%3Ereally. really lucky.%3Cbr%3Eyou get one like mine.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day%3Cbr%3Ewith Love%3Cbr%3Efrom Karen%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Close in Heart
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EDad.%3Cbr%3EI wish%3Cbr%3EI could be with you%3Cbr%3Eto celebrate this special day %26#151;%3Cbr%3Eto tell you in person%3Cbr%3Ejust how much you mean to me%3Cbr%3Eand how lucky I feel%3Cbr%3Eto have you for my dad.%3Cbr%3EBut even though we%26#146;re apart.%3Cbr%3Eyou%26#146;ll still be very much%3Cbr%3Ein my heart today...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...because. as always.%3Cbr%3EI%26#146;ll be thinking of you %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ewith warmth and pride%3Cbr%3Eand a whole lot of love!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Father%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3Efrom Michelle%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Easter's Beauty
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Wonderfully%3Cbr%3EHappy Easter.%3Cbr%3EJoyce!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor the dear things%3Cbr%3Eyou are%3Cbr%3EAnd the dear things%3Cbr%3Eyou do...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay all of Easter's beauty%3Cbr%3Ebe yours%3Cbr%3Eall year through!

thumb.name: Luck Forever!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJust for You.%3Cbr%3EPeg and Timmy.%3Cbr%3Eon St. Patrick's Day%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo wish you the grandest%3Cbr%3ESt. Patrick's Day ever%3Cbr%3EAnd a bunch of good luck%3Cbr%3EThat stays with you forever!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Great Day
